Why purchase travel insurance

We know every trip is different, and so are your travel concerns. As the nationâ€™s original travel insurance comparison site, InsureMyTrip has over 20 years of experience connecting travelers like you with the best policy for your trip.

Learn more
  • Medical Emergencies

    Many regular health insurance plans do not cover medical expenses incurred abroad. Travel insurance can provide coverage for medical emergencies, hospital stays, and medical evacuations.

  • Emergency Evacuations

    Many regular health insurance plans do not cover medical expenses incurred abroad. Travel insurance can provide coverage for medical emergencies, hospital stays, and medical evacuations.

  • Medical Emergencies

    Many regular health insurance plans do not cover medical expenses incurred abroad. Travel insurance can provide coverage for medical emergencies, hospital stays, and medical evacuations.

  • Lost or delayed baggage

    Many regular health insurance plans do not cover medical expenses incurred abroad. Travel insurance can provide coverage for medical emergencies, hospital stays, and medical evacuations.

  • Travel delays

    Many regular health insurance plans do not cover medical expenses incurred abroad. Travel insurance can provide coverage for medical emergencies, hospital stays, and medical evacuations.
